input.sentences: we all went to the convention center for the event tonight .
there were a lot of people already there .
they had a lot of tasty food to eat .
we met a lot of new people .
some received awards throughout the night .
output.sentences: We had to walk around awhile to find out where we were supposed to be.
I ate the most amazing celebratory food.
We were so proud on him.
His teacher took a photo and shared with us how much she enjoyed having him in her classes.
